patthana17.10:4.1: Kusalaṃ sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.10:4.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana17.10:5.1: Abyākataṃ asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.10:5.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.10:6.1: Abyākataṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.10:6.3: Hetuyā pañca … pe … āsevane tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
